channel.title: Alaris || Gambling || Boss Pets || Comp Cape || 50+ Customs - Dygores
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Uwzl5wG.gif[/img] [url=http://alaris.ml]alaris.ml[/url] [url=http://alaris.ml/Alaris.jar]alaris.ml/Alaris.jar[/url]
Intro Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 17 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.
Features 5+ Wilderness bosses Wilderness activity points Boss Kill Logs Plenty of other Bosses Fun/easy Economy NPC\Player Clipping Completionist Cape + Achievements Gambler NPC (Gamble Vote points and Gold) Mithril seeds IPB forums Auto Vote Hiscores Boss pets + custom boss pet Some new osrs Items Login Tutorial Quick Prayers Plenty of Npcs to fight Custom Pirate Minigame Fast Leveling & More come check us out
Media [img]http://i.imgur.com/ynFqY8D.png comp[/img] cape drop [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ms5E884.png[/img] - serp slayer [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qd0qSQX.png[/img] - serp mage [img]http://i.imgur.com/5kDkZJd.png[/img] - Achievement tab [img]http://i.imgur.com/XA2TXtz.png[/img] - boss kill log [img]http://i.imgur.com/zDgyRTZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/355y8UL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VdWHfoD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YSjx41Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OxgvnJg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/I8XFcSy.png[/img] - the new customs [img]http://i.imgur.com/81xyp2E.png[/img] boss pet [img]http://i.imgur.com/w4kBrXe.png[/img] - cust boss pets [img]http://i.imgur.com/s7sT1O8.png[/img] - Completionist [img]http://i.imgur.com/SicaOvU.png[/img] - Bosses [img]http://i.imgur.com/YixGiCx.png[/img] - Bosses 2 [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZSjyFJx.png[/img] - glacors [img]http://i.imgur.com/Iht5a48.png[/img] - gamb 1 [img]http://i.imgur.com/32Nu6nv.png[/img] - gamb 2 [img]http://i.imgur.com/8SkKOUS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zUyi1Ex.png[/img] - Aoc [img]http://i.imgur.com/MEneoo0.png[/img] - dragon mask [img]http://i.imgur.com/40CcjtZ.png[/img] - dragon mask [img]http://i.imgur.com/xvCFDj7.png[/img] - ckey [img]http://i.imgur.com/WGM9kCI.png[/img] - wildy bosses [img]http://i.imgur.com/nzfEMx9.png[/img] - drop table [img]http://i.imgur.com/t5irROg.png[/img] vet ion [img]http://i.imgur.com/2l4ohGG.png[/img] vene [img]http://i.imgur.com/hNs5nLd.png[/img] scorpia [img]http://i.imgur.com/gJwNUly.png[/img] -Dzone

item.description:
@Nerdypker123 wrote:

[font=georgia]Not a lot of players, but it’s a pretty good server from first look. I may stick around for a while. Enjoyable, only problem is the vote needs to be fixed. /: Other than that, good server.[/font]

item.title: Alaris || Gambling || Boss Pets || Comp Cape || 50+ Customs - Dygores
item.dc:creator: @kamarscape kamarscape
item.description:
@kamarscape wrote:

Uwzl5wG.gif800×90

alaris.ml
alaris.ml/Alaris.jar

Intro
Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 17 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.

Features
5+ Wilderness bosses
Wilderness activity points
Boss Kill Logs
Plenty of other Bosses
Fun/easy Economy
NPC\Player Clipping
Completionist Cape + Achievements
Gambler NPC (Gamble Vote points and Gold)
Mithril seeds
IPB forums
Auto Vote
Hiscores
Boss pets + custom boss pet
Some new osrs Items
Login Tutorial
Quick Prayers
Plenty of Npcs to fight
Custom Pirate Minigame
Fast Leveling
& More come check us out
